import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import bannerImg from "./img/fin.jpg"; import "./profile.css"; // Import profile.css instead of AboutUs.css import Container from "react-bootstrap/Container"; import logoftp from "./img/fin.jpg"; import avatar from "./img/fin.jpg"; import abdur from "./img/fin.jpg"; import Thani from "./img/fin.jpg"; const About = () => { return (

About Us

Farm to plate is an organization that enables farmers to display their products and facilities. Instead of being dependent on the complex supply chain, farmers can sell their fresh products to the local customers. While empowering the farmers, we ensure that the local people are getting healthy and fresh produces from their nearest farms.

Our Mission

Our mission is to make the world more sustainable while having the farms and local shops connected with the local community. Our aim to have all the farms of London registered with us within July 2023 and cover the whole UK within December 2024. We plan to play a prominent role in the world of fresh produces from year 2025.

Our Team

{/* Updated class name */}

Carlotta

Scrum Master: Sprint1A

); }; export default About;
